Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on the Impact of Preoperative Vascular Mapping on Long-term RC-AVF Failure

Participants.evidence: 110 patients with end-stage kidney disease (ESKD) from 2018 to 2024

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates the influence of preoperative vascular mapping on long-term radio-cephalic arteriovenous fistula (RC-AVF) failure

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was long-term RC-AVF failure, assessed over a mean follow-up of 1.98 years

Result_Outcome.evidence: Adherence to guidelines was associated with lower long-term failure (HR: 0.44, p = 0.012), but significance was lost after adjusting for cardiovascular risk factors and CVC presence (HR: 0.69, p = 0.328)
